name: .WTB File Extension
summary: Learn about .WTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WTB file with versions 3 and above of Win-Test (Windows). To do so, select File â†’ Open from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your WTB file.
You can use version 4 of Win-Test to convert a WTB file to the newer WT4 format. You can use version 3 or 4 of Win-Test to convert the data a WTB file contains to the following formats (and others):
